name: ACH_Complete_Stage_One_Noob
description: You have safely made your way out of Anna's first trap on the easiest setting possible. Try harder, noob.

name: ACH_Complete_Stage_One_Gud
description: You have safely made your way out of Anna's first trap with an average amount of competency. If you were a real pro you'd do it on Nightmare setting.

name: ACH_Complete_Stage_One_Nightmare
description: You have bested Anna's first nightmare stage. Don't let it go to your head, there are more to go.

name: ACH_Larry_Failboat_10
description: You have died to zombie kills 10 times. Way to man the failboat, scrub.

name: ACH_Larry_Failboat_50
description: You have died to zombie kills 50 times. You're moving on up the failboat foodchain; you're so bad you are now a Failboat Captain.

name: ACH_Larry_Failboat_100
description: You have died to zombie kills 100 times. You're now the Admiral of the Failboat fleet. You're mother will be so proud of you.

name: ACH_Sanity_Specialist
description: You have survived the first sewer level without losing a single point of sanity. Congrats, you figured out how to stay in the light.

name: ACH_Sanity_Elite
description: You have survived the more difficult task of besting Annalinnia's second sewer system nightmare without losing a single point of sanity. Hurrah to you, great work at basically being as good as a flashlight.

name: ACH_Sanity_God
description: This is actually impressive, you've survived Annalinnia's mountain path nightmares without losing a single point of sanity. Although she begrudgingly gives you some respect for this, she believes you must have cheated somehow.

name: ACH_Mushroom_Gatherer
description: You have collected 100 mushrooms. Congrats on staying sane a little longer.

name: ACH_Mushroom_Collector
description: You have collected 1000 mushrooms. Maybe you should have looked for the clue's instead of following dead end paths.

name: ACH_Mushroom_Hunter
description: You have collected 10,000 mushrooms. Your dedication towards mindlessly picking up shiny objects is exemplary.

name: ACH_Blood_Thrall
description: You have absorbed 100 pints of blood. Your stomach may have trouble digesting all of that.

name: ACH_Blood_Bat
description: You have absorbed 1,000 pints of blood. You are officially a vampire bat, now flap away little fella.

name: ACH_Blood_Vampire
description: You have absorbed 10,000 pints of blood. Welcome home Vlad, your steak shall be served raw and your goblets overflowing with type O Negative.

name: ACH_Skull_Gatherer
description: You have collected 100 power skulls. Did you remember to use any of them?

name: ACH_Skull_Collector
description: You have collected 1,000 power skulls. With all that bone density osteoporosis will never affect you.

name: ACH_Skull_Hunter
description: You have collected 10,000 power skulls. Time to build your skull throne and sit atop of it while living in your skull mansion.

name: ACH_Larry_Failboat_1000
description: You have managed to die to stationary enemies 1,000 times. They never moved, not even once.

name: ACH_Annas_Nightmare
description: You have beaten Annalinnia's entire murder dungeon without dying a single time on the Nightmare difficulty. She didn't believe it was possible, neither does anyone else, cheater.

name: ACH_Zebukiel
description: You found Zebukiel. Now go watch his Twitch stream.
